remarks: The integral of a nonnegative constant times a function is the constant times the integral of the original function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itg2mulc.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
itg2mulc.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` F ) e. RR ) $.
itg2mulc.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
itg2mulc $p |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` ( ( RR X. { A } ) oF x. F ) ) = ( A x. ( S.2 ` F ) ) ) $.
